text: I had the worst crab ever in my life time. This chi liu xiang seafood they had a stall newly open at jln pari burong area. The food taste nice. And big portion too. Just waiting time need to be more patience ðŸ˜† the vibe of the shop quite good have cny mood for the deco. And no gst.

Worst CUSTOMER SERVICE AND food. They scam you by changing price from the display price. The lady at the counter was very rude attitude (20 Oct around 12pm). She refused to give chilli and utilities even large order. Very rude attitude, spoil the shop reputation. The food was not so great. Paid for large size but got it way lesser. I will look NOT forward this shop until they rectify the issue.

The food tastes great, especially salted egg with rice. I do recommend marmite chicken rice as well, quite delicious for a simple meal. The price is worth paying, in my opinion. The atmosphere pf the coffeeshop feels nice and peaceful.

Food here is a hit and miss and inconsistent. I had takeout on a few occasions and the standard was good one moment, bad the next. Really want to support but standard not there. This coffeeshop should close.
